name: Stop SOPA Ribbon
author: Konstantin Kovshenin

sections.description: A black ribbon with the words “Stop SOPA” will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the American Censorship website. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop SOPA/PIPA entry in the WordPress news too. Thank you for showing your support!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip archive.
  2. Extract it in your wp-content/plugins folder or upload via admin panel.
  3. Browse to your plugins section and active the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release, nothing fancy, this is a 5-line plugin written to practice my Dvorak typing skills. Props to @yoast for the cursor/pointer tip.

short_description: Help stop American Consorship by putting a ribbon that says Stop SOPA on your WordPress site or network.
description: A black ribbon with the words “Stop SOPA” will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the American Censorship website. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop SOPA/PIPA entry in the WordPress news too. Thank you for showing your support!

screenshots.caption: Here's how the ribbon will appear on your website. Will link to the americancensorship.org site.
